board - Static variable in class Model.Pieces.Piece

pieceCode - Variable in class Model.Pieces.Piece
Model.Piece's code : 1 : Model.Pieces.Pawn, 2 : Model.Pieces.Knight, 3 : Model.Pieces.Bishop, 4 : Model.Pieces.Rook, 5 : Model.Pieces.Queen, 6 : Model.Pieces.King, Negative for black piece
